replies.author: 小庄c
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-9-7 15:40
换成 LockettePro 吧

 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=567962
我换一下试试看，现在在解决部分bug

replies.author: 三列玖座丶
replies.txt_content:
删除Lockette插件，然后按照对应版本的插件
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-567962-1-1.html
出自
connection_lost大佬

replies.author: 极地雪
replies.txt_content: 是Lockette锁插件出了问题，可以更换其它锁插件或升级一下版本试试
